name: Grubble
description: Background By overlapping over your previous tunnels, you can collapse them and crush any chasing bugs. But be careful and avoid being too close to those explosive slugs! Hints - Slugs will jiggle when you're near them. This is an evolutionary tactic developed in order to scare predators and competitors away. - You will slowly shrink as you burrow your way through the dirt. It's tiring stuff after all! - Boosting yourself burns away your fat faster, better save it for when you need it! - Crushed bugs leave behind tasty limbs that will increase your muscle mass, perfect for fuelling your intense digging habits! Controls: - Left and right arrow keys to turn. (or A and D) - Space Bar to boost
